column4: hi, guys, in 'ifconfig', what is "Bcast", is that like the default gateway in windows?
it's the LAN broadcast address
erm, is that the same as gateway? how do i find the gateway?
no, it's different
it is used for sending packets to every local host
the gateway transmits packets to the outside network
i see,   thanks, so how do i find out the gateway address?
the broadcast usually ends in .255.  gateways often have .1, but it can be anything from 1 to 254
you will usually need to know it already or guess it

what machine are you using as the gateway?

yes
then they should find the gateways automatically when they attempt dhcp setup
